thread.title: This is how Aditya Pancholi is trying to get his son Sooraj's career back on track
thread.title_full: This is how Aditya Pancholi is trying to get his son Sooraj's career back on track - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: This is how Aditya Pancholi is trying to get his son Sooraj's career back on track
text:
Aditya Pancholi 
Concerned father Aditya Pancholi has taken upon himself to get son Sooraj's career back on track.
Sooraj Pancholi 
Salman Khan may have launched the youngster in Bollywood, but Sooraj's career did not take off. His debut flick Hero (2015) proved to be a damp squib. Later, films announced with him were either shelved or kept on the backburner.
Aditya has been approaching Bollywood's old guard to give his son a second chance. Expect an announcement soon.
